title: (Stabilisation) Act 2010 (No.36 of 2010) are delegated to Jennifer Carroll
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance (delegation ministerial functions) order 2023

title: (Stabilisation) Act 2010 (No.36 of 2010) are delegated to Jennifer Carroll
heading: 2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Finance conferred on him by
text_raw:
2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Finance conferred on him by 
or under subsections (2) and (3) of section 67 of the Credit Institutions 
(Stabilisation) Act 2010 (No.36 of 2010) are delegated to Jennifer Carroll 
MacNeill T.D., Minister of State at the Department of Finance. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 

of the Government, 

31 January, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [27] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
